text:
Hello everybody! Looking to gain some insight into prod/dev/staging using HubSpot CMS. I’ve read through the docs but cant seem to find what I’m looking for, so giving the Slack a shot. Apologies if this has been answered before.

I have a client who has a live website, built as a custom theme in HubSpot CMS. This fall they want to scrap everything and start fresh.

Is there any way of creating a stage version with a new theme (and separate content), while the old theme (with old content) is still running, and then “flip the swith” to replace the old with the new?

Usually (like in WP, Contentful or similar) I would set up a completely separate stage on a subdomain. I would be pushing code to it, and the client would work on all the content. Then, when its finished, I would replace the old with the new.

From what I’ve read this might not be possible to do with HubSpot CMS, but I might have missed something.

How do you handle these things? Any help would be appreciated.

Yes! But from what I understand I wouldnt be able to modify any global theme files without it being reflected on the live site?

The big issue here is that the new branding is _completely_ different from the old, so it has to be a hard theme switch.
Theme, templates, modules etc. will all have to be replaced for good content editing ergonomics too.
If you use fresh themes, modules and menus, the changes shouldn't be reflected.
I will read into it more then! Thank you for the help!
Def psyched to get into HubSpot CMS. Looks very promising.
Stands and Falls with your templating skills, it's a great tool, if you use it right!
It works really well with the way I’ve been building and reasoning about CMS-based websites.
But would def be a bit more complicated to work around the limitations without the past years developments in web tech :sweat_smile:
Or rather, the developments will make development a lot smoother

hello everyone, I have created a new crm-card project for HubSpot using HubSpot cli but when i am uploading the project using the command hs project upload i am getting error  C:\zinomy\integrations\HubSpot\extensions\hb-extenstions\test-ext> hs project upload
? [--forceCreate] The project test-ext does not exist in prod (46991171). Would you like to create it? Yes
[SUCCESS] New project test-ext successfully created in prod (46991171).
:heavy_multiplication_x: Failed to upload test-ext project files to prod (46991171)
I would say two things - make sure you are using the latest CLI version - and I would also post this question in this channel:  <#C05R599UA12|ui-extensions>
the issue is resolved guys thank you
